short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights VA web components and accessibility issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks VA.gov by highlighting accessibility issues, elements that need to be converted to web components, and information that needs to be hidden by DataDog Real User Monitoring (RUM) sessions - internal tool, not for general usage.
